amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide an exception to certain provisions in the bill to taxicab drivers, bus drivers, nurses, medical providers or others in the business of professional transport.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 109-56 to immunize taxicab drivers, bus drivers, others in the business of professional transport, doctors, nurses, and/or other medical providers or their staff from the transportation provision of the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Scott (VA) amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 179 - 245 (Roll no. 141).
